text: Saucy Sylvia (Sylvia Cadeski; July 27, 1920 â€“ May 25, 2017) was a Canadian- born American comedian, classically trained pianist, singer, and radio personality. She was born in Owen Sound, Ontario. In the 1940s and the 1950s, she hosted The Sylvia Show on radio. Sylvia died at her home in Newport, Rhode Island from complications of pneumonia on May 25, 2017 at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== *Sex is the thing that started it all *0069 *Saucy Sylvia's Official Website Category:1920 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in Rhode Island Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian radio personalities Category:Singers from Ontario Category:Musicians from Ontario Category:Comedians from Rhode Island Category:American pianists Category:American radio personalities Category:Singers from Rhode Island
title: Saucy Sylvia
